article.para: &suseregistry; is the official catalog of &bci;s. It contains tested, updated and certified &&bcia;s. All images in the &suseregistry; are rebuilt regularly to include updates and fixes. All container images available on the &suseregistry;'s website are grouped into the following categories:

varlistentry.term: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server Container Images

listitem.para: Choose these images if you do not have a &scc; subscription, you do not need access to the &sles; repositories, or you plan on building images you want to redistribute.
These images are similar to redistributable &bci;s, but they include specific programming language environments. These images can be distributed.
Container images that include specific applications, such as MariaDB, PostgreSQL, and NGINX. These images cannot be redistributed.

article.para: The Web UI also provides additional information for each image, including release date, support level, size, digest of the images and packages inside the image.
